thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Brixton Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfectly situated
thread.title_full: Perfectly situated - Review of Premier Inn London Brixton Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Jeff M
title: Perfectly situated
text:
My girlfriend and I stayed here overnight, to save commuting back after a gig at O2 Academy Brixton and to give us a base to visit friends and family around London.
The hotel is perfectly situated to give quick access to both the tube and overground, as well as great venues and the thriving Brixton market.
The staff were very friendly and helpful, and the room was lovely. I also used the available luggage storage facilities to save dragging a case around the city; I have found most Premier Inn's have this facility, but it's best to check to be sure.
